DataElement.preferredName: Medical Device Product Material Identifier OMOP CDM Unique Device Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing._A UDI or equivalent identifying the instance of the Device used in the Person.
